comments:
build i0217-2000

In the Packages Explorer I selected all my projects (except for the External
Plug-ins one) and used the context menu to close them.

They closed correctly by I got the following exception in my log file.

I have been unable to reproduce this issue and looking through JDT's code, it looks like they set the scheduling rule to be the workspace which is just fantastic.
